articles.title: Video: Trump says he's financially supporting Jan. 6 rioters in radio interview - CNN Video
articles.description: Gavin Smith, former campaign aide to Donald Trump, reacts to the former president's claim he's financially supporting Jan. 6 rioters and will look "very, very favorably on full pardons" if he runs and wins in 2024.

articles.title: This neighborhood is considered 'ground zero' for illegal street racing - CNN Video
articles.description: Fast and the Furious fans invade LA neighborhood during all hours of the day to take over the street and host illegal block races. CNN's Stephanie Elam spoke to neighbors  fed up with the dangers and destruction caused by the drivers.

articles.author: Paradise Afshar, CNN
articles.title: TikTok influencer dies following sky diving accident in Toronto
articles.description: A Canadian TikTok influencer died last week following a sky diving accident in Toronto, a friend who attended her funeral told CNN.

articles.title: CNN report: This disturbing trend has become 'staggeringly common' in Putin's wartime Russia - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Nick Paton Walsh reports on the death of Lukoil Chairman Ravil Maganov, one of several high-profile Russian businessmen who've reportedly died by apparent suicide.

articles.author: Keith Allen, Paradise Afshar and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Texas governor says rape victims can take Plan B morning-after pill
articles.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said this week that rape victims in his state can take Plan B, a pregnancy-preventing emergency contraceptive known as a "morning-after pill."

articles.author: Stephanie Elam and Jason Kravarik, CNN
articles.title: From burning rubber to street racing, residents are 'Furious' about the influences of a movie franchise on the safety of their Los Angeles neighborhood
articles.description: Bob's Market in Angeleno Heights may look like a regular Los Angeles convenience store, but it's an icon.

articles.author: Andrew Kaczynski and Samantha Woodward, CNN
articles.title: Donald Trump has repeatedly called for lengthy jail sentences for those who he claimed mishandled classified information
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump has repeatedly called for the lengthy jailing of opponents of his who he claimed mishandled classified materials.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA is ready to 'go' for a second launch attempt of Artemis I today
articles.description: The uncrewed Artemis I mission is ready for a second chance at launching on a historic journey around the moon. NASA's launch window opens at 2:17 p.m. ET and closes at 4:17 p.m. ET on Saturday.
articles.content: Turn to CNN for live coverage from Kennedy Space Center in Florida on Saturday afternoon. Space correspondent Kristin Fisher will bring us moment-by-moment reporting from the launch, along with a tea… [+5122 chars]

articles.author: Ella Nilsen, CNN
articles.title: This city has around 20 days of fresh water left. Officials are racing to find another source
articles.description: A city in New Mexico has about 20 days of fresh water left, and officials there are scrambling to find another source to prevent cancer-causing particles from flowing out of faucets.
articles.content:
(CNN)A city in New Mexico has about 20 days of fresh water left, and officials there are scrambling to find another source to prevent cancer-causing particles from flowing out of faucets.

articles.author: Stella Chan and Zoe Sottile, CNN
articles.title: Street takeovers and wheelie contests force closures on iconic Los Angeles bridge, LAPD says
articles.description: Authorities have been forced to intermittently close Los Angeles' iconic 6th street bridge four times in five days for various illegal activity, including street takeovers, says the Los Angeles Police Department.
